long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hi! Bless is the world's first shared computer.

Our extension allows you to automatically and anonymously contribute spare compute power from your device to the websites, applications and services that you use, in exchange for rewards. Instead of relying upon companies like Amazon Web Services or Google Cloud, we're creating an internet that's both powered and controlled by the people that use it.

Learn more about Bless at https://bless.network/#faqs
